verses.verse: Then the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Now shalt thou see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: for with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall he let them go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall he drive them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>.
And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

And I appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%>, unto Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, by the name of 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, but by my name <S%H8034><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> was I not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to them.

And I have also established <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> of their pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%>, wherein they were strangers <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And I have also heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the groaning <S%H5009><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, whom <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> keep in bondage <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8688><s%>; and I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and I will bring <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you out from under the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and I will rid <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you out of their bondage <S%H5656><s%>, and I will redeem <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you with a stretched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> out arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with great <S%H1419><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%>:

And I will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you to me for a people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be to you a 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which bringeth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> you out from under the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you in unto the land <S%H776><s%>, concerning the which I did swear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it to Avraham <S%H85><s%>, to Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and to Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it you for an heritage <S%H4181><s%>: I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> so unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: but they hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> for anguish <S%H7115><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and for cruel <S%H7186><s%> bondage <S%H5656><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in, speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that he let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> go out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me; how then shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me <S%H589><s%>, who am of uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> ?

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and gave them a charge <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to bring <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

These be the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> ' houses <S%H1004><s%>: The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, and Pallu <S%H6396><s%>, Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, and Karmi <S%H3756><s%>: these be the families <S%H4940><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>; Jemuel <S%H3223><s%>, and Jamin <S%H3226><s%>, and Ohad <S%H161><s%>, and Jachin <S%H3199><s%>, and Zohar <S%H6714><s%>, and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Kanahanitish woman <S%H3669><s%>: these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>.

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>; Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, and K'hat <S%H6955><s%>, and M'rari <S%H4847><s%>: and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>; Libni <S%H3845><s%>, and Shimi <S%H8096><s%>, according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of K'hat <S%H6955><s%>; Amram <S%H6019><s%>, and Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, and Hevron <S%H2275><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>: and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of K'hat <S%H6955><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of M'rari <S%H4847><s%>; Mahali <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi <S%H4187><s%>: these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>.

And Amram <S%H6019><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Yokheved <S%H3115><s%> his father's sister <S%H1733><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Aharon <S%H175><s%> and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>: and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>; Korach <S%H7141><s%>, and Nepheg <S%H5298><s%>, and Zichri <S%H2147><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>; Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Elzaphan <S%H469><s%>, and Zithri <S%H5644><s%>.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him EliSH'va <S%H472><s%>, daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>, sister <S%H269><s%> of Naashon <S%H5177><s%>, to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Nadav <S%H5070><s%>, and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korach <S%H7141><s%>; Assir <S%H617><s%>, and Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, and Abiasaph <S%H23><s%>: these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Korhites <S%H7145><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> Aharon's <S%H175><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him one of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Putiel <S%H6317><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Pinchas <S%H6372><s%>: these are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

These <S%H1931><s%> are that Aharon <S%H175><s%> and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, to whom <S%H834><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>.

These <S%H1992><s%> are they which spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: these are that Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%>.
And it came to pass on the day <S%H3117><s%> when the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>,

That the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>: speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all that I say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto thee.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, Behold, I am of uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>, and how shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me?
